# Say my name

Take about 8 minutes to do the following locally:

+ Open your blogdown project and use the serve site add-in.

+ Go to `content/authors/admin/`.

+ Rename your profile .jpg pic `avatar.jpg` and drop it in here (say yes to replace it).

+ Edit the `_index.md` to customize.

---

1. Go to  `config/_default/params.toml`. Now have some fun! Here are some ideas:
    + change the color theme
    + play with the day/night theme button
    + change the font 
    + ensure that <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i> code is highlighted (check out the "Hello R Markdown" post to see these changes in action)
